nodes.text: Ruffian was a male Weequay pirate in Hondo Ohnaka's band of pirates, the Ohnaka Gang. He was with Hondo Ohnaka on Florrum when Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker and Count Dooku were kidnapped, when the spice was stolen and when Representative Jar Jar Binks and a group of clone troopers came to rescue them.
